answer:
Squawking 7600 indicates you have "Lost Communications". The air traffic control tower would send the following light signals to an airplane in the air to transmit landing clearance or other intentions:
  • **Steady Green light:** Cleared to Land
  • **Flashing Green light:** Return for landing
  • **Steady Red light:** Give way to other aircraft and continue circling
  • **Flashing Red light:** Airport Unsafe: Do Not Land
  • **Alternating Red and Green light:** Exercise extreme caution
    • (Pilot's Handbook of Aeronautical Knowledge 14-16)
